Title: Morgan Stanley sells 19 lakh shares worth Rs 81 lakh in this penny stock
Description: Morgan Stanley sold 19.30 lakh shares of Kesoram Industries for Rs 81 lakh at Rs 4.20 per share, an 11% discount. The stock hit a 52-week low, closing at Rs 4.50. Other entities also offloaded significant stakes via block deals.

Title: Goldman Sachs acquires HAL, Zomato shares worth Rs 281 crore

Title: AU Small Finance Bank raises Rs 770 crore from HDFC Bank, other investors
Description: AU Small Finance Bank secured ₹770 crore through tier-II bonds at a 9.20% coupon. Investors included HDFC Bank, Nippon India Mutual Fund, and insurers. The funds will strengthen the bank’s capital adequacy and support digital banking expansion.

Title: Bank lending growth halves in February amid retail and NBFC slowdown
Description: Bank lending growth in FY'25 until February slowed to 10.9% from last year's 20.6% due to a decline in retail and NBFC loans, according to RBI data. Credit to the services sector grew by 13%, while industry credit growth was 7.3% in the same period.
